stories.text:
Hi HN! I'm Adel, CEO and Founder of LEIRA TECHNOLOGIES. Over the past few months, we have been working on a new concept of BI and data analytics that makes it easy to run analytics on your data. Our product is called TrackZero. TrackZero aims to help startups and enterprises run analytics and reports without the complexity of developing reports. So you can always be on top of your business and focus on what matters, all it takes are simple integration steps. With TrackZero, you can track any type of object (Entity) in your app/solution and track Events emitted by those entities. Entities and events can also reference other entities to create a mesh of data allowing for multi-dimensional reporting and eliminating duplication. Then simply and easily run deep analysis, reports and Machine Learning based forecasts on how your users behave on your platform.

Give it a try for free on https://www.trackzero.io We believe you will love it!

I would love to hear your feedback as well. When you are ready to upgrade, please contact us for a special discount code referencing this message before your purchase.

Thanks, Adel
stories.title: Show HN: TrackZero – Analytics Made Easy
